steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Mailings' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Create' group, click on the 'Envelopes' button.
In the 'Envelopes and Labels' dialog box, switch to the 'Envelopes' tab.
Enter the recipient's address in the 'Delivery address' field.
Enter your return address in the 'Return address' field.
Click on the 'Options' button to specify envelope options if needed.
Click on the 'Print' button to print the envelope.
